channel.title: Some ppl on rs are retarded
channel.description: this guy tried to sell me mith platebody for 17K when I already had addy. Then this other guy called me a noob for not accepting and he was like lvl 45 is a noob and he was only lvl 52.

leet was an old cheating program for some game cant remember and the game banned the name leet so people
and its easier to type thats why i talk like this hoooooooooooooomies

item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

CToaN:

this guy tried to sell me mith platebody for 17K when I already had addy. Then this other guy called me a noob for not accepting and he was like lvl 45 is a noob and he was only lvl 52.

Could have been a clever scam.... peer pressure.

item.title: Some ppl on rs are retarded
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

going back to your title... i totally agree with you.. anybody who talks like this...

i luv ma gf on runescape 4 lyphe is gotta be retarded. no offense (lol) to the people who speak it on this forum, but seriously.... WHY DO PEOPLE HAVE TO TALK IN LEET???

WTF IS LEET?? someone hopped up on dope who got bored with masterbation and harrdcore s and m decided to start it... sorry but it's just dumb. lol ok im done
